message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product at a price that I think you'll find very reasonable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1800000.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000.
I understand you're looking to make a deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1200000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1600000, but I'm not going any lower than that.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1300000.
I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to go a bit lower, but not all the way to $1300000. How about $1550000?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about $1250000?
I'm starting to feel like we're getting a bit too far apart, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm not losing out on a good deal. How about $1450000?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm really trying to stay within my budget. How about $1220000?
I'm not willing to go below $1300000, Bob. That's as low as I'm willing to go. If you're willing to meet me at that price, we can make a deal.
I really appreciate your efforts, Alice, but I'm afraid I've reached my budget limit. I'm willing to meet you at $1200000. If you're willing to accept, we can make a deal.
